label: subjectTypeCode
comment: A code specifying a subject type for this licence.
A code specifying a subject type for this specified certificate.
A code specifying a subject type for this specified condition.
A code specifying a subject type for this specified declaration.

rangeIncludes.comment: A character string used to represent a subject code.

domainIncludes.comment: A permit from an authority to own or use something, do a particular thing, or to conduct a trade.
A document issued by a government, public organization or association to certify a property of a person, entity, process or object.
A state, such as of a specified person or thing.
An act of notification by formal documentation or action, in any form prescribed or accepted, such as a self-declaration.
